author: Mx Bex per/they #ReclaimGenderQueerFlag💜🤍💚
text:
... I took from a position of privilege, one I felt FORCED to make. *Had* I turned around & walked out or spoilt my ballot that would NOT have been privilege either but HOPELESSNESS. 
Stop assuming marginalised people choosing not to vote is anyway our fault or privilege. 
2/2

author: Mx Bex per/they #ReclaimGenderQueerFlag💜🤍💚
text:
I was in absolute quandary today. Only 2 candidates standing, 1 tory & 1 Labour. I didn't want to vote for either. However, this is a chance to send a message to this corrupt gov that they're wrong & done. 
So once again I held my nose & voted lab. 
Not an easy choice, NOT one 1/ https://t.co/NcvlnaiiLn

author: Mx Bex per/they #ReclaimGenderQueerFlag💜🤍💚
text:
It's more horrific to have it misinterpreted as abuser fake crying when we'll have been the recipients of that fake crying many times over. 
Video to follow, it's on phone. 8/

author: Mx Bex per/they #ReclaimGenderQueerFlag💜🤍💚
text: ....things my father does to us. I try not to say too much as I know many of my friends love JD but this tears thing is so harmful to survivors. We didn't choose to be survivors, we didn't ask for our trauma to stop our tears, to be misunderstood about that is horrific. 7/

author: Mx Bex per/they #ReclaimGenderQueerFlag💜🤍💚
text: ... I wanted JD to not be the abuser, I wanted it to be both because he's JD, but his eyes are the same dead eyes as my father's. His actions, here's a video of him miming shooting as the defense psychologist talks about his threats to kill AH, it's chillingly identical to 6/

author: Mx Bex per/they #ReclaimGenderQueerFlag💜🤍💚
text:
... it's sheer trauma response that tears didn't happen. 

When she says during one of the rape she just stood & stared at the light & "let" it happen, I stared in/at the mirror & "let" it happen. 

Her eyes tell her truth, they tell my truth, they tell a survivors truth. 5/

author: Mx Bex per/they #ReclaimGenderQueerFlag💜🤍💚
text:
...cunning not sorrow, loss or despair, red faced but no real emotion aside from screwed up fake cry face all red and dead eyed. 

So I know intimately both contextually relevant types of tearless crying. 

Amber Heard was my tearless crying, her body & soul cried 4/

author: Mx Bex per/they #ReclaimGenderQueerFlag💜🤍💚
text:
... I look very like Amber H does in her testimony, eyes lost, broken, despairing, hopeless, body & face crying but no tears. 

On the single occasion my father ever acknowledged what he did to me he did the abuser fake cry but no tears. Dead eyes, face screwed up but full of 3/

author: Mx Bex per/they #ReclaimGenderQueerFlag💜🤍💚
text:
...trauma but I don't cry, can't. Which is odd & cr*p because I cry at the drop of a hat about alot of stuff. My therapist told me it's a trauma response that in order to speak it some parts of us have to shut down. 

Which makes sense. 

When I'm orally talking about my rape 2/
